sentences.en: But it didn't take long before he realized that the country's economic miracle has a underbelly.
sentences.cn: 但不久他就意识到,中国经济奇迹的背后却有着让人沮丧的一面.

sentences.en: I know where his soft underbelly is, and that's his material possessions.
sentences.cn: 我知道他的弱点是什么，是他的财产。

sentences.en: Methods 24 cases of underbelly fat accumulation underwent tumescent liposuction technique.
sentences.cn: 方法对24例下腹部脂肪堆积症行肿胀吸脂术治疗.

sentences.en: Mintz has gotten a rare glimpse at the underbelly of tireless ambition.
sentences.cn: 敏茨获得了对不知疲倦抱负”灰色角落“一瞥的难得机会.

sentences.en: The ANC are attacking rugby because it is the soft underbelly of South African sport.
sentences.cn: 橄榄球运动在“非国大”受到抨击，因为它是南非体育的软肋。

sentences.en: The missiles emerge from the underbelly of the transport plane.
sentences.cn: 导弹从那架运输机的底部飞了出来。

sentences.en: The sick woman complains on acute pain in the underbelly ( in the heart area ).
sentences.cn: 患病妇女说她下腹剧痛 ( 心脏部分 ).

sentences.en: To keep the shuttle from burning up, 34,000 separate tiles protect its underbelly.
sentences.cn: 为防止太空梭不被烧毁, 需要用34,000个独立瓷片来保护机身.

sentences.en: Your robot infantry will all lock into the underbelly of the enormous transport.
sentences.cn: 你的机器步兵会全部挂在大型飞行器的底下.

trans.tran_cn: 下腹部的，物体的下方，易受攻击的地带
trans.tran_en: the weakest part of an organization or a person’s character, that is most easily attacked or criticized
